name: deck20
description: Connect Roll20 to a Stream-Deck and add DSA related helpers/tools!
author: Maximilian Ertl <ertl.maxi@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy-bex: quasar build -m bex && git add -f dist/bex && node -p -e "'[ BEX BUILD ] Deck20 '+ require('./package.json').version" | git commit -F - --no-gpg-sign && git subtree push --prefix dist/bex origin release/bex
scripts.force-push-deployment: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist/bex main`:release/bex --force
